mapper.select: SELECT m_id, m_name, tel, email FROM mem ORDER BY m_id
SELECT m_id, m_name, tel, email FROM mem WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mem (m_id, m_name, tel, email) VALUES (#{m_id}, #{m_name}, #{tel}, #{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE mem SET m_name = #{m_name}, tel = #{tel}, email = #{email} WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
